dialogue.speaker: Lila
dialogue.text: Oh, I'm so excited for our trip to the beach tomorrow!

dialogue.speaker: Ethan
dialogue.text: I know, me too! I've been packing my sunscreen and sunglasses all day.

dialogue.speaker: Lila
dialogue.text: Ha! You're going to need it. The sun can be strong this time of year.

dialogue.speaker: Ethan
dialogue.text: Definitely. So, what's the plan for tomorrow? Are we going to hit the waves or relax on the sand?
